title: Establish Formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline

reasoning.problem: Establish Formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline. Given the increasing volume of PDF documents received (e.g., research papers), it's crucial to develop a system for automatic extraction of key information, indexing, and efficient storage. This will allow for better utilization of research and improved strategic decision-making.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
